title: Rising Tensions Between the U.S. and Iran & Honoring Escaped Slaves for Juneteenth | Arturo Castro
itunes:title: Rising Tensions Between the U.S. and Iran & Honoring Escaped Slaves for Juneteenth | Arturo Castro
description:
U.S.-Iran tensions escalate, Roy Wood Jr. commemorates Juneteenth with stories of escaped slaves, and Arturo Castro chats about his show Alternatino with Arturo Castro.
